channel.title: Vistex || Spawn Server || Its All About PK'ing
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/142zok6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/dme49j.png[/img]
[SIZE="6"][COLOR="Lime"][B][U][URL=http://"http://vistexforums.com/showthread.php/1-Vistex-Official-Links?p=1#post1"]Play Now![/URL][/U][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[I][COLOR="Red"] Vistex may be looked upon as a ordinary server. However this is far from the actual truth, Vistex unlike many servers, is a created for the players. We strive on creating the 'Perfect' server.
We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at Vistex.
Vistex is not just a 'game' but a place to relax and enjoy yourself. We try our absolute best on having a fun and safe environment. We believe that everyone should treated the same no matter what. We are all strong. We are all confident. We are all Vistex. [/COLOR][/I]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mg2jb9.png[/img]
Features[CODE][CENTER][COLOR="White"] *Spawning *Token Economy *PvP Everywhere *Clan Wars Pking *All Specials *All Spells Working 100% *HD Items and Characters *Fully working Overloads *Recover Special Working *Killing Achievements *New Right Clicks *Faster Client Loading *Better Server Stability *100% Ancient Curses *A lot of commands *Perfect Hitsplats *All Weapon Specials 100% *Domination Tower *Perfect Combat *New Items *Perfect Switching *Dicing *Perfect Clan Chat *Money Pouch *Exp Counter *VPS Hosted *24/7 Uptime *KillStreak System *Loyalty Titles *Player Owned Shops [/COLOR][/CENTER][/CODE]
Videos [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zifx_3AIKmI&feature=plcp"]Vistex Spawn Pk Vid[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M7yMsduMvEA&feature=plcp"]Vistex Hybriding[/URL]
Media! Combat [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mkOMb.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5NsWD.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9JdZ0.gifv[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QMc6g.gif[/img]
Misc [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KkinL.png[/img] New Items: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2yyyxd1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/dgtlzq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aNsvz.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aYCRQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WUVHZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IEzGa.png[/img]
Weapon Specials [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MnlA5.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dGTnZ.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aArnw.gif[/img]
New Items [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HaPdJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Gy9oe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c1yhF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WrhLJ.png[/img]
[B][U][COLOR="Red"] Developers:[/COLOR][/U][/B] Me - Source & Client Stefano - Source Connor - Client Frank - Source - kronikz
[IMG]http://www.habbofansite.net/fontgen/index.php?text=Credits&style=75[/img] Myself Stefano Connor Frank - me MoparScape Community Rune-Server Community
*THIS THREAD WILL BE UPDATED DAILY WITH INFORMATION AND MEDIA*
[/CENTER]

item.title: Vistex || Spawn Server || Its All About PK'ing
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Just stating a couple of things right now.

  1. Kronikz_ is not in fact associated with Vistex, in terms of development. Nor is he the Owner.
  2. The server is owned by me.
  3. Working on the server atm, going to release the final (hosted) version in about a weeks time. Probably less.
  4. Thanks for all the positive feedback

Read full topic

item.title: Vistex || Spawn Server || Its All About PK'ing
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:445186”]Played this a little today…just thought you should know that isn’t “perfect hitsplats.”

Have you tested all ancient curses? in the 602 one that penor released ( I think it was penor? ) the shadow curses did not show the gfx properly

The melee combat could use some accuracy tweaking as well. Hits are still too high from what I saw in game.

Take all of this as CC iwubu[/quote]
its not too high O_O Combat is probally atleast one of the best. The base that was used was VengX pvp 2 O_O

Thanks for the feedback, Ill be sure to look over it.

Read full topic

The melee combat could use some accuracy tweaking as well. Hits are still too high from what I saw in game.

Take all of this as CC iwubu
